content:
• Thursday, September 1, 2011
  • VIAV

    JDS Uniphase (JDSU) gains +2.2% in after hours trading on the back of better than expected FQ1...

    JDS Uniphase (JDSU) gains +2.2% in after hours trading on the back of better than expected FQ1 results from industry peer Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR).
     
     
     
     
    | 6:46 PM
  • HRB

    More on H&R Block (NYSE:HRB): FQ1 Y/Y loss widens on weaker revenue, plus charges stemming...

    More on H&R Block (NYSE:HRB): FQ1 Y/Y loss widens on weaker revenue, plus charges stemming from the proposed sale of its RSM McGladrey tax and consulting business. Shares -5.3% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:26 PM | 1 Comment
  • MITL

    Mitel Networks (NASDAQ:MITL) FQ1 swings to a loss on restructuring costs, but beats overall...

    Mitel Networks (NASDAQ:MITL) FQ1 swings to a loss on restructuring costs, but beats overall estimates on a 14% jump in revenues from its DataNet segment. The company reiterates guidance at the high-end of analysts' forecasts. Shares +7.55 AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:15 PM
  • FNSR

    More on Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR): FQ1 profits were down 48% Y/Y amid soft demand from Chinese...

    More on Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR): FQ1 profits were down 48% Y/Y amid soft demand from Chinese customers but bottom line numbers were better-than-expected. The company also guides to the high-end of FQ2 estimates, projecting revenue to come in around $235M to $250M vs. analysts' expectations of $237M. Shares +7.9% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:52 PM
  • NFLX

    Starz breaks off contract renewal talks with Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) over differences in pricing...

    Starz breaks off contract renewal talks with Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) over differences in pricing and packaging, saying it will end programming as of March 2012. In a statement, Starz CEO Chris Albrecht says the decision "is a result of our strategy to protect the premium nature of our brand." Shares -8.5% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:59 PM | 8 Comments
  • ESL

    Esterline Technologies (NYSE:ESL) FQ3 earnings misses estimates across-the-board. Net income...

    Esterline Technologies (NYSE:ESL) FQ3 earnings misses estimates across-the-board. Net income came in at $37.7M, -4.5% Y/Y on weakness in its defense contracting business due to cuts in government spending. The company reiterates at the lower-end of guidance consensus. Shares -8.7% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:34 PM
  • FNSR

    Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR): FQ1 EPS of $0.21 beats by $0.03. Revenue of $228M (+10% Y/Y) in-line....

    Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR): FQ1 EPS of $0.21 beats by $0.03. Revenue of $228M (+10% Y/Y) in-line. Expects FQ2 Revenue at $235M-$250M, GAAP OM at 5.5%-7.0%, Non-GAAP OM at 8.5%-10.0%, Non-GAAP EPS at $0.20-$0.24. Shares +7.8% AH. (PR)
     
     
     
     
    | 4:04 PM
  • M

    Though Macy's (M +2.3%) is gaining after reporting August same-store sales that beat Street...

    Though Macy's (M +2.3%) is gaining after reporting August same-store sales that beat Street estimates, most firms that reported (I, II, III) are following the market lower. JCP -1%. ROST -2%. SKS -2%. TJX -3.2%. FRED -2.5%. LTD -1.9%. ZUMZ -2.7%. JWN -1.4%.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:14 PM
  • GPS

    Gap (GPS -2.8%) pares back its loss following a lackluster sales report, but analysts aren't...

    Gap (GPS -2.8%) pares back its loss following a lackluster sales report, but analysts aren't going easy on the retailer. Brian Sozzi from Wall Street Strategies says Gap's stepped-up pace of promotions to clear inventory did not "resonate" well with consumers.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:57 PM
  • BCSI

    Blue Coat (BCSI +7.8%) shares are up sharply after the software company discloses a short-term...

    Blue Coat (BCSI +7.8%) shares are up sharply after the software company discloses a short-term standstill agreement with Elliott Associates, which controls 9.9% of the its stock. Blue Coat agrees to share confidential information "for the purpose of Elliott’s evaluation of alternatives with respect to its investment,” which could include talks to sell the company.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:57 PM
  • GERN

    Geron (NASDAQ:GERN) soars 11% as option activity takes off on the biopharmaceutical company with...

    Geron (NASDAQ:GERN) soars 11% as option activity takes off on the biopharmaceutical company with calls outpacing puts by 50-to-1. Traders may be looking favorably at new data suggesting stem cells can be used to treat patients disabled by stroke.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:49 PM
  • LGF.A

    Shares of Lions Gate (LGF +4.3%) move higher, gaining back ground lost from the rundown after...

    Shares of Lions Gate (LGF +4.3%) move higher, gaining back ground lost from the rundown after Carl Icahn's selloff announcement. According to SEC filings, massive insider buying looks to be helping support the share price.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:36 PM
  • MPR

    Shares of pollution control technology firm Met-Pro (MPR -4%) are down today, after its Q2...

    Shares of pollution control technology firm Met-Pro (MPR -4%) are down today, after its Q2 earnings missed estimates on a 4% dip in revenue - due to a slowdown in sales at one of its top customers - while bottom line margins were pressed by higher overall material costs.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:27 PM
  • NXPI

    Diversified chipmaker NXP (NASDAQ:NXPI) is up 2.7% after Moody's upgrades its debt to B2, with a...

    Diversified chipmaker NXP (NASDAQ:NXPI) is up 2.7% after Moody's upgrades its debt to B2, with a positive outlook. NXP, which was taken public by its PE owners last year, had roughly $4.7B in short-term and long-term debt at the end of Q2 - a figure higher than its $4.2B market cap.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:25 PM

  • Itron (ITRI -3.8%) is lower today after announcing the immediate retirement of its President and...

    Itron (ITRI -3.8%) is lower today after announcing the immediate retirement of its President and CEO Malcolm Unsworth, renaming former chairman and CEO LeRoy Nosbaum as his successor. Cantor Fitzgerald cut its rating to hold on the news, saying the "abrupt and decisive management change" jeopardizes the company's performance over the near-term.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:04 PM
  • CAT

    As quiet as a CAT, shares of Caterpillar (CAT -2.2%) have climbed 10% in just over a week - even...

    As quiet as a CAT, shares of Caterpillar (CAT -2.2%) have climbed 10% in just over a week - even allowing for today's selloff. Analysts point to the pitched-battle over acquisitions with Joy Global (JOY -1.4%) as helping the company keep a foot on the accelerator.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:53 PM
  • BONT

    The Bon-Ton Stores (OTC:BONT -8%) takes a hit after saying August same-store sales were down...

    The Bon-Ton Stores (OTC:BONT -8%) takes a hit after saying August same-store sales were down 4.7% Y/Y. Comparable store sales also decreased by 1.8%, while YTD total sales dipped 2.4%. The company says the decline was partially due to the negative impact on its eastern stores from Hurricane Irene, but it's difficult to quantify.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:43 PM
  • VIAV

    JDS Uniphase (JDSU +1.7%) is up today after RBC raises it to outperform with $18 price target,...

    JDS Uniphase (JDSU +1.7%) is up today after RBC raises it to outperform with $18 price target, citing an improvement in order bookings.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:26 PM
  • GLUU

    Glu Mobile (GLUU +23.6%) shares surge on speculation that the publisher of mobile social games...

    Glu Mobile (GLUU +23.6%) shares surge on speculation that the publisher of mobile social games for smartphones and tablets might prove an enticing takeover target for Zynga. Nate Greene says Glu's "unique" platform enables its titles to be accessible to a broad audience of consumers, and it boasts a growing presence in China.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:18 PM
  • RGR

    Shares of Sturm Ruger (NYSE:RGR) fall 3.8% on volume 3X normal trading activity after shedding...

    Shares of Sturm Ruger (NYSE:RGR) fall 3.8% on volume 3X normal trading activity after shedding 6% yesterday. Momentum traders may be bailing out the stock after it enjoyed a huge runup following its blockbuster Q2 report.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:53 PM
  • ICFI

    ICF International (ICFI -5%) is lower at mid-day after Stifel Nicolaus cut the shares to hold,...

    ICF International (ICFI -5%) is lower at mid-day after Stifel Nicolaus cut the shares to hold, citing concerns over cutbacks to government spending.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:52 PM
  • RPM

    RPM International (RPM -5.6%) trades lower after Oppenheimer cut the shares to underperform,...

    RPM International (RPM -5.6%) trades lower after Oppenheimer cut the shares to underperform, citing several challenges, including soft U.S. and European construction markets, and weak pricing power.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:33 PM
  • UTIW

    UTi Worldwide (UTIW +16.3%) pops after its Q2 earnings came in better-than-expected, as net...

    UTi Worldwide (UTIW +16.3%) pops after its Q2 earnings came in better-than-expected, as net revenue jumps 17% Y/Y on improved shipping demand and better fuel cost management.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:59 AM
  • LUV

    Airline stocks (XAL -0.7%) struggle after an industry report says freight traffic declined 0.4%...

    Airline stocks (XAL -0.7%) struggle after an industry report says freight traffic declined 0.4% (Y/Y) in July. The IATA's Tony Tyler says, "with business and consumer confidence now tanking, sluggishness in international trade, and high fuel prices, the expectation is for a weaker end to the year." Decliners: LUV -1.3%, UAL -1%, LC -1.9%.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:45 AM
  • SWKS

    Skyworks (NASDAQ:SWKS) is up 4.1% after Charter's Ed Snider upgrades the wireless chipmaker...

    Skyworks (NASDAQ:SWKS) is up 4.1% after Charter's Ed Snider upgrades the wireless chipmaker vendor to Buy. Snider, who upgraded shares to Neutral prior to a strong FQ3 report, likes Skyworks' recent acquisitions, as well as its market share gains with NOK and historically low valuation. He believes these factors help offset lost business with AAPL.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:43 AM
  • DVOXQ

    Education and speech technology provider DynaVox (DVOX -11.8%) is lower today after its FQ4...

    Education and speech technology provider DynaVox (DVOX -11.8%) is lower today after its FQ4 earnings came in weaker-than-expected late yesterday. Revenue dipped 2% Y/Y on a decline in school budgets, and bottom line margins took an additional hit from an impairment charge. The company guides FY12 EPS to the low end of estimates.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:39 AM
  • WEN

    Shares of Wendy's (WEN +3.3%) move higher after the firm announces hiring Yum! Brands (YUM...

    Shares of Wendy's (WEN +3.3%) move higher after the firm announces hiring Yum! Brands (YUM -0.5%) exec Emil Brolick as its new CEO. Outgoing CEO Roland Smith says his replacement will continue the firm's strategy of remaking its breakfast menu and offer new cheeseburgers.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:31 AM
  • BAH

    Booz Allen Hamilton (BAH -6.6%) is lower this morning after being cut to hold by Stifel Nicolaus...

    Booz Allen Hamilton (BAH -6.6%) is lower this morning after being cut to hold by Stifel Nicolaus on concerns of increasing "industry headwinds" and uncertain federal spending levels.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:09 AM
  • MOV

    High-end watchmaker Movado (NYSE:MOV) gains 10% after reporting FQ2 revenue of $113.2M (+33%...

    High-end watchmaker Movado (NYSE:MOV) gains 10% after reporting FQ2 revenue of $113.2M (+33% Y/Y) and EPS of $0.18, beating consensus by $16.6M and $0.12. Gross margin was 53.8%, up 1.8% from the year-ago period. The company expects FY12 EPS of $0.60-$0.65, below a $0.68 consensus. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 11:07 AM
  • SHFL

    Shares of Shuffle Master (SHFL +9.1%) ride a strong earnings report higher. The firm beat EPS...

    Shares of Shuffle Master (SHFL +9.1%) ride a strong earnings report higher. The firm beat EPS estimates by $0.02 on in-line revenue for Q3 FY11. Recurring revenue growth as a brisk 11%, and sales in its electronic gaming machines segment doubled to $18M. The firm adds it's now well-positioned to take advantage of global opportunities.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:52 AM
  • BK

    After falling sharply on news of the CEO's departure, BNY Mellon (BK +2.2%) shares reverse and...

    After falling sharply on news of the CEO's departure, BNY Mellon (BK +2.2%) shares reverse and turn higher. The ubiquitous Dick Bove tells CNBC he expects big things from the lender, currently earning far too little on its "staggering" cash pile.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:47 AM
  • MATN

    Oxigene (OXGN -23%) sinks to a new 52-week low after halting Phase 2 and 3 studies of its...

    Oxigene (OXGN -23%) sinks to a new 52-week low after halting Phase 2 and 3 studies of its thyroid cancer drug candidate Zybrestat due to lack of funding, and announces a restructuring whereby it will reduce its workforce by 60%.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:43 AM
  • LQDT

    Investors are taking a shine to shares of Liquidity Services (NASDAQ:LQDT), up 20%, after the...

    Investors are taking a shine to shares of Liquidity Services (NASDAQ:LQDT), up 20%, after the firm agrees to purchase Jacobs Trading for $140M. The online marketplace provider is now trading just off its 52-week high.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:25 AM
  • MEI

    Shares of Methode Electronics (MEI -10.5%) sink after the firm misses the consensus...

    Shares of Methode Electronics (MEI -10.5%) sink after the firm misses the consensus EPS estimate of analysts for Q1 FY12 by $0.06 on in-line revenue. Looking forward, the firm's CEO says a slowdown in its European automotive business will impact FY12 results beginning in Q4.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:08 AM

  • Stocks jump higher following the better-than-expected ISM print. Dow and S&P +0.8%, Nasdaq...

    Stocks jump higher following the better-than-expected ISM print. Dow and S&P +0.8%, Nasdaq +0.9%. Down moderately prior to the number, Europe moves into the green, the Stoxx 50 +0.7%.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:04 AM | 2 Comments
  • TRMB

    Trimble Navigation (TRMB +3.9%) posts a sold gain after catching an upgrade from Piper Jaffray...

    Trimble Navigation (TRMB +3.9%) posts a sold gain after catching an upgrade from Piper Jaffray to Overweight, along with a PT increase to $50 from $44. "TRMB is poised to see continued strong growth in its highest margin segment (Field Solutions) well into 2012, which should serve as a catalyst to move estimates and valuations higher," writes Piper to clients.
     
     
     
     
    | 9:56 AM
  • LDOS

    SAIC (SAI) -10.6% after its Q2 results miss across the board and it cuts its FY outlook. SAIC,...

    SAIC (SAI) -10.6% after its Q2 results miss across the board and it cuts its FY outlook. SAIC, which supplies the Defense and Homeland Security departments, is suffering from the "challenging government contracting environment."
     
     
     
     
    | 9:30 AM
  • CELL

    Brightpoint (NASDAQ:CELL) gains 5.7% premarket as Citi's Jim Suva upgrades shares to Buy. Suva...

    Brightpoint (NASDAQ:CELL) gains 5.7% premarket as Citi's Jim Suva upgrades shares to Buy. Suva thinks Brightpoint would be a major beneficiary if the DOJ's lawsuit to stop the AT&T/T-Mobile (NYSE:T) merger succeeds, given the company's sales to T-Mobile stores. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 9:27 AM
  • GPS

    GAP (NYSE:GPS) -4.7% after it reports that same-store sales in August dropped 6% vs. forecasts...

    GAP (NYSE:GPS) -4.7% after it reports that same-store sales in August dropped 6% vs. forecasts of -3.8%. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 9:19 AM | 1 Comment
  • CIEN

    Premarket gainers: CIEN +14%. CTIC +10%. RBS +8%. CLWR +5%. RAD +5%. BCS +5%. NOK +4%. LYG +4%....

    Premarket gainers: CIEN +14%. CTIC +10%. RBS +8%. CLWR +5%. RAD +5%. BCS +5%. NOK +4%. LYG +4%. JDSU +4%. MPEL +3%. WEN +2%. MGM +3%.
    Losers: OTC:DCTH -11%. SAI -9%. STD -3%. BK -3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:05 AM
  • DCTH

    Delcath (OTC:DCTH) shares -9.7% after it says its chemosaturation system was not effective in...

    Delcath (OTC:DCTH) shares -9.7% after it says its chemosaturation system was not effective in patients with colorectal cancer in a mid-stage trial. The blow comes a week after the same treatment was shown to be effective in treating primary liver cancer. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 8:52 AM
  • JNS

    Janus Capital (NYSE:JNS) is up 3% premarket after a Susquehanna note to clients says a strategic...

    Janus Capital (NYSE:JNS) is up 3% premarket after a Susquehanna note to clients says a strategic buyer could step forward and offer as much as $18 per share for the firm. Susquehanna maintains a Positive rating on shares of the investment management company.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:26 AM
  • CIEN

    Shares of Ciena (NASDAQ:CIEN) are up 13% premarket after beating the consensus EPS estimate of...

    Shares of Ciena (NASDAQ:CIEN) are up 13% premarket after beating the consensus EPS estimate of analysts by $0.16 on revenue of $435M for Q3. The firm's CEO points to reduced operating expenses and a favorable product mix as boosting results.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:20 AM
